title: In-memory engine: in gc assertion failed
body:
## Bug Report

[2024/10/17 01:20:02.022 +00:00] [FATAL] [lib.rs:479] ["assertion failed: self.in_gc.load(Ordering::Acquire) != in_gc"] [backtrace="   0: tikv_util::set_panic_hook::{{closure}}\n             at
